definition: to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: Consult your legal counsel if you have any doubts about reusing content.
sentences.chinese: 若对重用内容有任何疑问，请咨询您的法律顾问。

sentences.english: ONE highly-skilled legal professional and one man in a very expensive suit.
sentences.chinese: 一个高级法律顾问和一个穿着非常昂贵的西装的男人。

sentences.english: How the hell did he get to be a pezzonovante, Hagen wondered.
sentences.chinese: 黑根在想，他怎么就做到总统顾问上来了。

sentences.english: Paley's friends and advisers told him that he had made a huge mistake.
sentences.chinese: 佩利的朋友和顾问告诉他，他作出了巨大的错误。

sentences.english: Floyd discuss with local construction consultant for project details.
sentences.chinese: 与当地工程顾问商讨建筑细节。

sentences.english: If you are getting behind, talk to your teacher or counselor.
sentences.chinese: 如果你落后了，就找你的老师或顾问聊聊。

sentences.english: Okay, so I work in the TV industry in London as a gardening consultant.
sentences.chinese: 好的，我在伦敦的电视行业工作，是一名园艺顾问。

sentences.english: She consults with companies on strategic marketing plans that incorporate social and traditional media.
sentences.chinese: 她为企业作社交媒体与传统媒体整合营销的顾问工作。

sentences.english: In criminal cases a q. c. may appear alone .
sentences.chinese: 在刑事案件中，王室法律顾问可以单独出庭。

sentences.english: The vice-adviser advised the reviser to devise adevice for getting rid of vice.
sentences.chinese: 代办顾问发起校订者想出一个根除败行的计谋。

sentences.english: That's also why they call their DSR 's Beauty Consultants.
sentences.chinese: 这也是为什么他们称他们的直销代表为美容顾问。

sentences.english: Example : Obama's chief China advisor is an experienced China hand.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马的首席中国问题顾问是个经验丰富的中国通。

sentences.english: Affidavits from two attorneys or counselors at law in India.
sentences.chinese: 两名印度律师或法律顾问出具的保证。

sentences.english: This use of lawyers by business people is called preventive law .
sentences.chinese: 企业家这样使用律师，叫做防范性法律顾问工作。

sentences.english: He suggests asking advisers to dissect a specific situation that has occurred to them.
sentences.chinese: 他建议让顾问剖析一个他们曾遇到过的具体情况。

sentences.english: I'llgo and talk with my adviser.
sentences.chinese: 我要去和我的顾问商议。

definition: head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
chief editor (of newspaper)/abbr. for 總編輯|总编辑
